Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.31117348] Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC>100μM), Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC>100μM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 15597(MIC>100μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC>100μM), Salmonella Typhimurium 6192(MIC>100μM), Klebsiella pneumoniae NCTC 5055(MIC>100μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.31117348] 5% hemolysis at 250 μM against human blood cells.
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-nagetive bacteria.

Literature.Author: Hammond K, Lewis H, Faruqui N, Russell C, Hoogenboom BW, Ryadnov MG
